class.rdfs:comment:
The term "story" is any indivisible, re-printable
    	unit of a comic, including the interior stories, covers, and backmatter. Most
    	comics have at least two stories: a cover (ComicCoverArt) and an interior story.
class.rdfs:label: ComicStory

schema:artist.rdfs:comment:
The primary artist for a work
    	in a medium other than pencils or digital line art--for example, if the
    	primary artwork is done in watercolors or digital paints.
schema:artist.rdfs:label: artist

schema:colorist.rdfs:comment: The individual who adds color to inked drawings.
schema:colorist.rdfs:label: colorist

schema:inker.rdfs:comment: The individual who traces over the pencil drawings in ink after pencils are complete.
schema:inker.rdfs:label: inker

schema:letterer.rdfs:comment: The individual who adds lettering, including speech balloons and sound effects, to artwork.
schema:letterer.rdfs:label: letterer

schema:penciler.rdfs:comment: The individual who draws the primary narrative artwork.
schema:penciler.rdfs:label: penciler
